title: Dataflow - Google-provided templates
abstract:
# Dataflow - Google-provided templates
Google provides [open source](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/DataflowTemplates) Dataflow templates that you can use instead of writing pipeline code. This page lists the available templates.
- For general information about templates, see the [Overview](/dataflow/docs/guides/templates/overview) .
- To get started, run the sample template [WordCount](/dataflow/docs/sample-template) .
- To create your own template, see how to [extend templates](/dataflow/docs/guides/templates/overview#extend) .
content:
